tourBios.exmtStatus: Conditionally Exempt: 61st qualifier from Qualifying Tournament, Money List 61-100
tourBios.carHigh: 2012: Made the cut in 10 of 25 Web.com Tour starts. Held the lead at the News Sentinel Open after firing a season-best 65 in the second round. Carded rounds of 69-68 on the weekend and finished the tournament in fifth place. Finished the year second on Tour in Putts Per Round. 2011: Made his first PGA TOUR start and missed the cut at the Frys.com Open. Played seven events on Gateway Tour and two events on the eGolf Tour.
tourBios.otherCarHigh: Attended Nevada Union High School in Grass Valley, Calif...Was a two-time AJGA All American...Won the 2004 Toyota World Junior Championship...Was a member of the 2008 NCAA national championship team at UCLA...Was a three-time All American at UCLA (2006 and 2008-09)...Pac-10 Freshman of the Year (2005-06)...Named to the All-Pac-10 first-team all four years.
tourBios.personal: Jobs outside golf include construction and landscaping...Instructors are Dave DeGrasse (swing) and Kevin Lozares (short game)...Always marks his ball with the coin tail's side up...Favorite websites are youtube.com and campaignforliberty.com...Enjoys watching the History Channel. His top movies are "Saving Private Ryan," "The Boondock Saints," "Rounders" and "Good Will Hunting." Favorite book is the Bible. Favorite food is his Mom's green chili. Favorite athletes to watch are LeBron James and Tim Tebow...Favorite vacation spots are Hawaii and New Zealand. Favorite gadget is the iPhone4...Snacks he carries in his golf bag include tuna sandwiches and bananas...Not many people know he does good impersonations of certain people...Supports A New Day, a depression-help center, and Campus Life Youth Ministry.

tourBios.exmtStatus: 1st Nationwide Tour Qualifier at the 2011 PGA TOUR Qualifying Tournament
tourBios.personal: Jobs outside golf include construction and landscaping...Instructors are Dave DeGrasse (swing) and Kevin Lozares (short game)...Always marks his ball with the tails side up...Favorite Web sites are youtube.com, campaignforliberty.com...Enjoys watching the History Channel top movies are "Saving Private Ryan," "Doondock Saints," "Rounders" and "Goodwill Hunting." Favorite book is the Bible. Favorite food is his mom's green chili. Favorite athletes to watch are LeBron James and Tim Tebow...Favorite vacation spots are Hawaii and New Zealand. Favorite gadget is the iPhone4...Snacks is his golf bag include tuna sandwich and bananas...Not many people know that he does good impersonations of certain people...Supports A New Day-Depression Help Center and Campus Life Youth Ministry.
tourBios.otherInfo: Attended Nevada Union High School in Grass Valley, CA...Was a two-time AJGA All American....Won the 2004 Toyota World Junior Championship...Was a member of the 2008 NCAA National Championship team at UCLA...Was a three-time All American at UCLA (2006, 2008, 2009)...Pac-10 Freshman of the Year (2005-2006)...Named to PAC-10 first-team all four years...Played seven events on Gateway Tour in 2011 and two events on the eGolf Tour in 2011.
tourBios.priorYearSeason: Had not made a start on the Nationwide Tour prior to the 2012 season.

dyn.dynResults: His best finish on the Web.com Tour was 5th in 2012 at the News Sentinel Open Presented by Pilot.
